topic.title: HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe scope of the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set is all PATIENTS who are diagnosed with Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) and receive HIV care from Health Care Providers.
